articles.title: Science News Roundup: How El Nino is helping drive heatwaves and extreme weather; Self-healing metal? It's not just the stuff of science fiction and more - Devdiscourse
articles.description: Scientists told Reuters that climate change and El Nino are the major drivers of extreme heat that have seen temperature records broken in Beijing and Rome, while leaving some 80 million Americans under excessive heat warnings.  Self-healing metal?
articles.content:

articles.title: US Army worried about how North Korea will treat Private King - Reuters
articles.description: The United States on Thursday voiced mounting concern over Army Private Travis King, who dashed into North Korea two days ago, saying Pyongyang had a history of mistreating captured Americans.

articles.title: President Biden visits Philly shipyard as he courts organized labor and pushes green jobs - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Joe Biden has paid a visit to Philadelphia's shipyard to make a pitch that unions will be building America’s renewable energy future. He's courting organized labor at a moment when some major unions are weighing strikes that could disrupt the growth…
